value.name: Darien denies controversial 7-Eleven plan at Duchess restaurant site
value.description: After months of deliberation, meetings, petitions and feedback, the Planning & Zoning Commission has unanimously denied an application to construct a 7-Eleven in the current Duchess restaurant site off Interstate 95.
